weka.classifiers.meta

Class EasyEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • weka.classifiers.IteratedSingleClassifierEnhancer
          • weka.classifiers.ParallelIteratedSingleClassifierEnhancer
            • weka.classifiers.RandomizableParallelIteratedSingleClassifierEnhancer
              • weka.classifiers.meta.EasyEnsemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.BatchPredictor, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HyperSMURF

    public class EasyEnsemble
extends weka.classifiers.RandomizableParallelIteratedSingleClassifierEnhancer
implements weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    Class for EasyEnsemble. EasyEnsemble splits up the majority class into n partitions and trains n classifiers using the majority partition and all minority classes.

    For more information, see

    Liu X, Wu J, Zhou Z. Exploratory undersampling for class-imbalance learning. Systems,Man, and Cybernetics, Part B: Cybernetics, IEEE Transactions on. 2009;39(2):539â€“550.

    BibTeX: 
     @article{Liu09,
    Author = {Liu, X. and Wu, J. and Zhou, Z.},
    Journal = {IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics, Part B: Cybernetics},
    Month = {April},
    Number = {2},
    Pages = {539-550},
    Title = {Exploratory Undersampling for Class-Imbalance Learning},
    Volume = {39},
    Year = {2009}
 }

    Valid options are: 

      -I <num>
  Number of partitions of the majority class. 
  (default 10)
 
      -S <num>
  Random number seed.
  (default 1)
 
      -num-slots <num>
  Number of execution slots.
  (default 1 - i.e. no parallelism)
 
      -D
  If set, classifier is run in debug mode and
  may output additional info to the console
 
      -W
  Full name of base classifier.
  (default: weka.classifiers.rules.ZeroR)

    Options after -- are passed to the designated classifier.

    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Max Schubach
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions(String[] options)
                throws Exception

        Parses a given list of options.

        Valid options are: 

          -I <num>
  Number of partitions of the majority class. 
  (default 10)
 
          -S <num>
  Random number seed.
  (default 1)
 
          -num-slots <num>
  Number of execution slots.
  (default 1 - i.e. no parallelism)
 
          -D
  If set, classifier is run in debug mode and
  may output additional info to the console
 
          -W
  Full name of base classifier.
  (default: weka.classifiers.rules.ZeroR)

        Options after -- are passed to the designated classifier.

        Specified by:
